comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

i put in a password for a page which i have no previous password saved


Actual results:

i got no dialogue asking me if the password should be saved, when looking at the password list,the password wasnt there


Expected results:

i should have been asked if i want the password saved

i have win 7 64 bit and newest firefox
when i disable hardware acceleration in firefox it works as it should.
when i enable again it doesnt work.i have been able to confirm this with different sites.
